Summary: thought it was a satellite, but object made a u-turn and disappeared
divs: Sighting DetailsI watched what I thought was a satellite move west to east. The object began to dim, slowly becoming less bright, and then it started to slow down. The object made a u-turn and after moving in an opposite direction for possibly three to five seconds, it disappeared and there wasn't any cloud coverage around it--it was a very clear summer sky tonight. I wish I had a video camera handy.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around July 16th 2009
